item.description:
BNI, the world's largest referral networking organization, has over 5,300 chapters in 40 countries. The Topsfield Chapter invites individuals interested in learning more about how to empower your business through word of mouth marketing to attend our Visitor's Day, Thursday, June 4th, from 7 a.m. until 8:30 a.m.

Belonging to BNI is like having dozens of sales people working for you. It's based on the proven concept of what goes around comes around. If I help you, you'll help me and we will both benefit as a result.

If referrals are an important part of your business, or should be, then BNI is the organization for you.

Join us June 4th to learn more about BNI and meet the members of Topsfield's Chapter. Please bring plenty of business cards.
item.name: Topsfield BNI Visitors' Day
